channel.title: MyNotes
channel.description: A minimalist blog theme for Astro

item.title: Predefined color schemes
item.description: Some of the well-crafted, predefined color schemes for AstroPaper blog theme.

item.title: How to add LaTeX Equations in Astro blog posts
item.description: Learn how to add LaTeX equations in Astro blog posts using Markdown, KaTeX, and remark/rehype plugins.

item.title: Dynamic OG image generation in AstroPaper blog posts
item.description: New feature in AstroPaper v1.4.0, introducing dynamic OG image generation for blog posts.

item.title: customizing astropaper theme color schemes
item.description: how you can enable/disable light and dark mode; and customize color schemes of astropaper theme.

item.title: Adding new posts in AstroPaper theme
item.description: Some rules & recommendations for creating or adding new posts using AstroPaper theme
